name: node-craigslist
description: a client library for searching, retrieving and creating Craigslist.com listings

scripts.pretest: jshint lib/*.js test/*.js ; rm -rf lib-cov ; jscoverage --no-highlight lib lib-cov
scripts.coverage: rm -rf reports ; mkdir -p reports ; NODE_NCL_COVERAGE=true mocha -R html-cov -r ./test/common.js ./test/lib > reports/coverage.html
